                            Valfaris

                            Devil Summoner series
                            Contra series
                            Ghosts 'n Goblins series
                            Fatal Fury
                            TOP HUNTER
                            …etc

Title name: XEARZ

Game Type: Action, Side-Scroller, Platformer, Metroidvania-lite
'Metroidvania-lite' means that the game is not mainly about exploration, but it includes a few exploration elements.

Desc: A type of game based on side-scrolling action, with event scenes interspersed in places along the storyline. 3DCG movies are played during the event scenes.
         In addition to the usual side-scrolling, the game will feature a multi-plane system, the game's most distinctive feature, which allows the player to move to terrain at the back or front.
   The Multi-plane system was influenced by SNK's 'Fatal Fury' and 'TOP HUNTER'. It is, so to speak, a development of that system.
   
   It is a stage-clearing type game, but you can destroy various background objects and enjoy searching for items that may appear after destruction. 
   The map has branches in various places, and could be called a Metroidvania-lite. A boss awaits at each stage.
   
   As for Story, it is a 'SF Philosophy Story' that combines science fiction and philosophy, as described below.

Sales Schedule: Scheduled to be available on Steam in 2022-2023.
